name: Black Aero Legacy
description:
A Mix Of Transparency And Black.

Version Info:

Next: Development Build 203 (Beta) Codename "Piano2" (Version 5.0.3)

NOTE: It Works ONLY With Tabs-On-Bottom (Go To About:Config And Then Click "I'll Be Careful, I Promise!" Then Type In Tabs In The Search Box On About:Config Then Double-Click Browser.Tabs.OnTop Then Leave The Page, Now You Got Tabs-On-Bottom!)
And It's Even Better With The Menubar!
